examples: The reporter asked the politician a ridiculous question about building a tunnel to the moon, and the politician responded with some nonsense about pink elephants.
You'll have your turn to respond after he's finished.
I need a minute to think about your question before I respond.
The young executive knew that a fool shows his annoyance at once, but a prudent man overlooks an insult, so he decided to take a deep breath and respond to the feedback in a constructive way.
In customer service, responding to angry customers in a calm manner can help to resolve the issue more effectively.
words.defineEn: to answer a question in spoken or written form
words.defineVi: để trả lời một câu hỏi ở dạng nói hoặc viết

examples: Her jokes had us all in stitches.
At the charity event, the wealthy businessman's joke had everyone in stitches.
My friends all joked that I had a hollow leg.
You must be joking!’
He didn't see the joke.
words.defineEn: something a person says that is intended to make others laugh
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó một người nói rằng đó là nhằm làm cho người khác cười

examples: The play was too funny for words.
He always tells funny jokes that make everyone laugh.
I saw some really funny pictures of myself as a kid and I couldn't believe what a minger I was.
She imagined kids making funny faces after trying scorzonera for the first time.
We spent the evening watching funny movies and she felt much better.
words.defineVi: có thể làm cho mọi người cười

examples: It was hysterical.
You were hysterical.
You're hysterical.
My view on this for Amazon-- - Is it hysterical or is it inappropriate-- -
Knowing these details in advance will help you both pick an investment with realistic goals, and help you keep your head if the news headlines get hysterical.
words.defineEn: characterized by or arising from psychoneurotic hysteria
words.defineVi: được đặc trưng bởi hoặc phát sinh từ chứng cuồng loạn thần kinh

examples: The movie was hilarious.
A clumsy chef accidentally spills ingredients, knocks over pots, and slips on the floor, creating a hilarious comedy of errors in the kitchen.
These kids are hilarious.
My mom is hilarious.
This thing is hilarious.
words.defineVi: gây ra niềm vui lớn và tiếng cười

words.defineEn: understand, usually after some initial difficulty
words.defineVi: hiểu, thường là sau một số khó khăn ban đầu

examples: Thanks for the pearl of wisdom, buddy, but your suggestion is ridiculous.
You've put our entire business at risk with this ridiculous scheme!
The reporter asked the politician a ridiculous question about building a tunnel to the moon, and the politician responded with some nonsense about pink elephants.
I'm sorry, but that ridiculous rationale cuts no ice with me and will not change my mind.
I can't believe he was able to pass off that ridiculous excuse as the truth.
words.defineEn: extremely absurd, silly, or unreasonable and deserving to be laughed at
words.defineVi: vô cùng vô lý, ngớ ngẩn, hoặc vô lý và đáng bị cười nhạo

examples: You’re just silly.
Stop inventing silly excuses.
It was a classic example of the saying 'ask a silly question and get a silly answer.'
When his friends teased him about his silly hat, he laughed along and played along with the joke.
It was a classic example of the saying 'ask a silly question and get a silly answer.'
words.defineVi: cảm thấy xấu hổ hoặc ngu ngốc

examples: The celebrity had to eat crow and apologize for her offensive comments after facing backlash from the public and media.
Upon seeing the offensive graffiti, a look of grimace crossed his face.
When I asked my grandfather how much sleep he got each night, he replied, 'six hours' sleep for a man, seven for a woman, and eight for a fool,' which I found surprising and somewhat offensive.
By 1917, they're making an offensive.
Yeah, that's very offensive.
words.defineEn: describing something that is upsetting or disrespectful
words.defineVi: mô tả một cái gì đó là khó chịu hoặc thiếu tôn trọng

words.defineEn: used to refer to something that is complicated or difficult beyond one's understanding or capability
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ một cái gì đó phức tạp hoặc khó vượt quá sự hiểu biết hoặc khả năng của một người
